author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Reversal in Indonesia Slams Freeport, an Investor Favorite Last Year
text:
A 19% tumble in Freeport McMoRan Inc. shares this week is signaling dwindling investor confidence that the company can quickly settle a protracted battle with Indonesia over a giant copper mine.
Revelations during the companyâ€™s quarterly earnings call this week, along with weaker-than-expected earnings, blindsided investors, sparking the steepest one-day drop in Freeport shares in more than two years Tuesday.
